# CAM::DO_SCREEN_FADE_OUT

## Summary
Fade OUT the main viewport with fade TO black

## Parameters
* **INT** time

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Fades the screen out.

duration: The time the fade should take, in milliseconds.
